name: Soul Hunt (Dratonix)
description:
This game is called soul hunt, you play as a Reaper, hunting souls, but whenever you hunt these souls you get cursed by them, some curses include slow speed, unable to jump, the rest are in the game, no spoilers! This is also the first game I actually completed and hope you enjoy it.

Controls: WASD

Reset: R

Pause: esc

Attack: Shift, CTRL, Left-Click

The Assets:

SFX:
